solution_line_template: The second ticket sold will cost ${first_ticket_price} + ${increment} = $<<{first_ticket_price}+{increment}={second_ticket_price}>>{second_ticket_price}.
The third ticket sold will cost ${second_ticket_price} + ${increment} = $<<{second_ticket_price}+{increment}={third_ticket_price}>>{third_ticket_price}.
The fourth ticket sold will cost ${third_ticket_price} + ${increment} = $<<{third_ticket_price}+{increment}={fourth_ticket_price}>>{fourth_ticket_price}.
The fifth ticket sold will cost ${fourth_ticket_price} + ${increment} = $<<{fourth_ticket_price}+{increment}={fifth_ticket_price}>>{fifth_ticket_price}.
After taking profit, the total prize money will be ${total_collected} - ${profit} = $<<{total_collected}-{profit}={prize_money}>>{prize_money}.
